LanguageData.Hungry.stages.0.label: hungry
LanguageData.Hungry.stages.0.description: I haven't eaten in a while.
LanguageData.Hungry.stages.1.label: urgently hungry
LanguageData.Hungry.stages.1.description: The hunger pangs are clawing my insides. I need food or I'll starve soon.
LanguageData.Hungry.stages.2.label: starving
LanguageData.Hungry.stages.2.description: I just want something - anything - to eat. I can feel my body wasting away. It hurts...
LanguageData.Tired.stages.0.label: tired
LanguageData.Tired.stages.0.description: I haven't slept in a while.
LanguageData.Tired.stages.1.label: very tired
LanguageData.Tired.stages.1.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...
LanguageData.Tired.stages.2.label: exhausted
LanguageData.Tired.stages.2.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.0.label: totally joy-deprived
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.0.description: It's been so long since I did anything I truly enjoyed.
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.1.label: very joy-deprived
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.1.description: I never get to relax and enjoy myself around here.
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.2.label: joy-deprived
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.2.description: I could really use a break for something enjoyable.
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.3.label: joy-filled
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.3.description: I've been having a great time here recently.
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.4.label: tons o' joy
LanguageData.JoyLevel.stages.4.description: I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.0.label: uncomfortable
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.0.description: I've been kind of uncomfortable recently. We need to get something soft to sit on around here.
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.1.label: comfortable
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.2.label: very comfortable
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.3.label: extremely comfortable
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.3.description: I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.4.label: luxuriantly comfortable
LanguageData.ComfortLevel.stages.4.description: I am resting on clouds of heaven.
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.0.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.0.description: This place is unpleasant to be in.
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.1.label: very ugly environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.1.description: This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.2.label: hideous environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.stages.2.description: This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.stages.0.label: pleasant environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.stages.1.label: very pleasant environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.stages.1.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.stages.2.label: beautiful environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.stages.2.description: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.stages.0.label: cramped environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.stages.0.description: This place is really closed-in. I feel like I have no space to breathe.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.stages.1.label: very cramped environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.stages.1.description: It's claustrophobic in here. I have nowhere to move. I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.
LanguageData.EnvironmentSpaciousInterior.stages.0.des: This is a really comfortably open indoor space.
